name: Quiet In The Deep
description:
Put on your diving gear and hop into the water: I hear there's treasure in the deep!

In this action stealth game, manage your health, air, and noise dip and dive your way through the waters on your watch to pick up treasures. Just be careful to not alert the creatures of your presence by kicking too hard: one bite from them is a free trip to Davy Jones's locker!

-----------------------------

This game was built as part of Ludum Dare 48 in the span of 72 hours by:

Chris Monteferrante - https://github.com/ludachrismonte

Robert Marzec - https://github.com/rjmarzec
